
```{r load osm, echo=T, message=F}
data("osm")
```

# Exploring all palettes

```{r load all palettes}
df_pal <- tibble (palettes= c("alphabet", "arctic","autumn", "autumn-muted","bw",
                        "desert","evening", "gray", "iberia", "imhof","lines","midnight",
                        "minimal","metropolitan","swiss","tropical"),
                  osm = list(osm)) |>
  rowwise() |>
  mutate(p = list(osm |> plot_map(palettes) + theme_infomap() + labs(title = palettes)))
```


```{r plot palettes, fig.dim=c(8.3,11.7), fig.dpi = 72, out.width="100%"}
df_pal |> pull(p)
```
